rooms.description: A spacious entrance area with a foyer that respects Vastu by using the north or east direction for entry.
The main living space offering ample seating and display areas. Designed with industrial aesthetics incorporating exposed brickwork and steel beams.
A compact dining area adjacent to the kitchen that facilitates interaction. Features natural lighting from north side as per Vastu guidelines.
Modern yet budget-friendly kitchen designed with efficient space planning. Includes essential appliances and a small pantry. Placed in the southeast to maintain Vastu harmony.
Spacious master bedroom with ample natural light and ventilation. Fitted with subtle industrial design elements like metal accents.
Additional bedroom for a joint family member. Designed to be functional and cozy with space-saving solutions.
A dedicated home office space with soundproofing for privacy. Features a minimalist design to balance productivity while respecting the budget.
A quiet library area intended for reading and study. Incorporates soft lighting and comfortable seating arranged to promote focus.
The home theater space designed with industrial design influences featuring exposed ducts and a custom acoustic layout. Positioned to minimize noise disturbances.
A compact utility room for storage of cleaning supplies and other household items.

openings.description: Main entry door aligning with Vastu principles to welcome positive energy.
Large window for natural light and ventilation, carefully positioned based on room orientation.
Appliance window to allow fresh air circulation and comply with Vastu guidelines.

additional_info.floor_plan_design: The design is optimized for a joint family living arrangement with shared spaces and private areas, ensuring both functionality and adherence to Vastu principles.
additional_info.budget_considerations: Cost-effective materials like exposed brick, concrete finishes, and pre-fabricated steel elements have been incorporated to keep the project within budget.
